Statements.Statement: UPDATE SFCase SET CaseType=@CaseType, CaseID=@CaseID, CaseNumber=@CaseNumber, CreaedBy=@CreaedBy, CreatedDate=@CreatedDate, CaseOwner=@CaseOwner, LastCommentAddedBy=@LastCommentAddedBy, LastModifiedBy=@LastModifiedBy, LastModifiedDateTime=@LastModifiedDateTime, Origin=@Origin, CurrentOnMaintenance=@CurrentOnMaintenance, JiraIssueURL=@JiraIssueURL, AccountName=@AccountName, CustomerName=@CustomerName, AgencyHosted=@AgencyHosted, SensitiveClient=@SensitiveClient, ContactName=@ContactName, ContactEmail=@ContactEmail, ContactPhone=@ContactPhone, Priority=@Priority, IssueType=@IssueType, Status=@Status, ParentCase=@ParentCase, Product=@Product, ReleaseInfo=@ReleaseInfo, Solution=@Solution, CurrentVersion=@CurrentVersion, TargetedRelease=@TargetedRelease, PatchNumber=@PatchNumber, Blocked=@Blocked, EscalatedBy=@EscalatedBy, Subject=@Subject, Description=@Description, EngineeringStatus=@EngineeringStatus, InternalSeverity=@InternalSeverity, EngineeringAssignment=@EngineeringAssignment, EngineeringComment=@EngineeringComment, InternalType=@InternalType, BZID=@BZID, IssueCategory=@IssueCategory, DevLOEEConfidence=@DevLOEEConfidence, ReleaseNoteContent=@ReleaseNoteContent, RankOrder=@RankOrder, GoLiveCritical=@GoLiveCritical, ServicesRank=@ServicesRank, LastUpdateTime=@LastUpdateTime, LastUpdateUserID=@LastUpdateUserID Where ID=@ID

SELECT ID ,CaseType ,CaseID ,CaseNumber ,CreaedBy ,CreatedDate ,CaseOwner ,LastCommentAddedBy ,LastModifiedBy ,LastModifiedDateTime ,Origin ,CurrentOnMaintenance ,JiraIssueURL ,AccountName ,CustomerName ,AgencyHosted ,SensitiveClient ,ContactName ,ContactEmail ,ContactPhone ,Priority ,IssueType ,Status ,ParentCase ,Product ,ReleaseInfo ,Solution ,CurrentVersion ,TargetedRelease ,PatchNumber ,Blocked ,EscalatedBy ,Subject ,Description ,EngineeringStatus ,InternalSeverity ,EngineeringAssignment ,EngineeringComment ,InternalType ,BZID ,IssueCategory ,DevLOEEConfidence ,ReleaseNoteContent ,RankOrder ,GoLiveCritical ,ServicesRank ,(SELECT TOP 1 SC.CommentBody FROM SFCaseComment SC WHERE SC.CaseNumber = CaseNumber AND SC.CreatedByName = 'Accela Support Team' ORDER BY SC.LastModifiedDateTime DESC ) AS LastEngineerComment ,(SELECT TOP 1 SC.CommentAuthor FROM SFCaseComment SC WHERE SC.CaseNumber = CaseNumber AND SC.CreatedByName = 'Accela Support Team' ORDER BY SC.LastModifiedDateTime DESC ) AS LastEngineerReviewer ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateUserID FROM SFCase
Order by ID ASC

SELECT ID ,CaseType ,CaseID ,CaseNumber ,CreaedBy ,CreatedDate ,CaseOwner ,LastCommentAddedBy ,LastModifiedBy ,LastModifiedDateTime ,Origin ,CurrentOnMaintenance ,JiraIssueURL ,AccountName ,CustomerName ,AgencyHosted ,SensitiveClient ,ContactName ,ContactEmail ,ContactPhone ,Priority ,IssueType ,Status ,ParentCase ,Product ,ReleaseInfo ,Solution ,CurrentVersion ,TargetedRelease ,PatchNumber ,Blocked ,EscalatedBy ,Subject ,Description ,EngineeringStatus ,InternalSeverity ,EngineeringAssignment ,EngineeringComment ,InternalType ,BZID ,IssueCategory ,DevLOEEConfidence ,ReleaseNoteContent ,RankOrder ,GoLiveCritical ,ServicesRank ,(SELECT TOP 1 SC.CommentBody FROM SFCaseComment SC WHERE SC.CaseNumber = SF.CaseNumber AND SC.CreatedByName = 'Accela Support Team' ORDER BY SC.LastModifiedDateTime DESC ) AS LastEngineerComment ,(SELECT TOP 1 SC.CommentAuthor FROM SFCaseComment SC WHERE SC.CaseNumber = SF.CaseNumber AND SC.CreatedByName = 'Accela Support Team' ORDER BY SC.LastModifiedDateTime DESC ) AS LastEngineerReviewer ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateUserID FROM SFCase SF
